body_html: I've submitted a patch to fix the issue. The underlying problem is with the test case itself which is too stringent. This issue can be reproduced on AVX2 builds if the random seed set at the start of the test is modified. The patch fixes the issue by reducing the error tolerance from 1e-11 to 1e-10. For more details see the commit message.
body_text: I've submitted a patch to fix the issue.  The underlying problem is with the test case itself which is too stringent.  This issue can be reproduced on AVX2 builds if the random seed set at the start of the test is modified.  The patch fixes the issue by reducing the error tolerance from 1e-11 to 1e-10.  For more details see the commit message.
body: I've submitted a [patch](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/21541) to fix the issue.  The underlying problem is with the test case itself which is too stringent.  This issue can be reproduced on AVX2 builds if the random seed set at the start of the test is modified.  The patch fixes the issue by reducing the error tolerance from 1e-11 to 1e-10.  For more details see the commit message.
